entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a person who blows his whistle to signal that all champions are inside the maze.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story, trying to navigate through the maze.

entities.name: the old feeling
entities.description: The old feeling that Harry is being watched is a sensation he experiences while navigating the maze.

relationships.description: Bagman signals to Harry through his whistle that all champions are inside the maze.
Harry experiences the old feeling of being watched while navigating the maze.
